column4: Do you have the appropriate debian/ directory and structure in the source directory or is this something that didn't have a package already?
it is something that didnt already have a package.  it is the program comical and i just built it from source
Look into the app called "checkinstall". Instead of running make install, run checkinstall and it'll do all of that for you.
that is it.  i couldnt remember.  thanks
